body: When im not playing MC I usually play WOW aka (World of Warcraft) I was wondering what other games do you guys play?
body_tagged: When im not playing MC I usually play WOW aka (World of Warcraft) I was wondering what other games do you guys play?
title: What other games do you guys play?

replies.body:
Usually I play Realm of The Mad God (IGN is TMountie) a bullet hell combat MMO RPG fighter game. Look it up xD

Other than that, I just play some solitare and some other random games on my iPhone.
replies.body_tagged:
Usually I play Realm of The Mad God (IGN is TMountie) a bullet hell combat MMO RPG fighter game. Look it up xD

Other than that, I just play some solitare and some other random games on my iPhone.

replies.body: I play, garry's mod, team fortress 2, just cause 2 multiplayer, portal 2, watch dogs and far cry 3 ( these are the pc games i play.... i play console games too like gta 5 and assassin's creed 4)
replies.body_tagged: I play, garry's mod, team fortress 2, just cause 2 multiplayer, portal 2, watch dogs and far cry 3 ( these are the pc games i play.... i play console games too like gta 5 and assassin's creed 4)

replies.body: Borderlands 2 (rarely, since I don't think OS X has multiplayer) and osu!.
replies.body_tagged: Borderlands 2 (rarely, since I don't think OS X has multiplayer) and osu!.

replies.body: Besides MC: Team Fortress 2, Skyrim, and COD. Mostly MC though (look at my online time).
replies.body_tagged: Besides MC: Team Fortress 2, Skyrim, and COD. Mostly MC though (look at my online time).

replies.body:
Too many games!
I have a ton of games on my Wii U, PS3, and my computer. 

If anyone wants to add me, feel free to ask!

replies.body: COD 4, Civ 5, Tf2. But mc is my usual thing.
replies.body_tagged: COD 4, Civ 5, Tf2. But mc is my usual thing.

replies.body:
I play:
OMSI Bussimulator
Euro Truck Simulator 2
And City Car Driving Simulator. 

I like driving sims, especially since I have the wheel/ pedals/ clutch + FacetrackNoIR
